means: 使公有化，使集体化( collectivize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Most large businesses were collectivized at the start of the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分大型企业在战争初期都转为了公有。

sentence.Network_en: Agricultural internationalization and global agricultural integration management is the world economy globalization and collectivized component.
sentence.Network_cn: 农业国际化和全球农业一体化经营是世界经济全球化和集团化的组成部分.

list.abs: under collectivism , the means of production is owned and controlled by the state or the people as a whole .在集体主义制度下，生产工具由国家或全民拥有和支配
The world is developing toward economic integration and area collectivize direction ;, 世界正朝经济一体化与区域集团化方向发展;
...海外优秀人才 overseas personnel of high caliber集体主义教育 collectivism education教师资格认定 teacher qualification accreditation.
the turning from " the tradition al collectivism " to " the new collectivism " is to perfect , enrich , strengthen and d evelop the collectivism rules .由“传统集体主义”走向“新集体主义”是集体主义原则的完善、富、实和发展。

entry.def: If farms or factories are collectivized, they are brought under state ownership and control, usually by combining a number of small farms or factories into one large one.

example.ex: Most large businesses were collectivized at the start of the war...
example.tran: 大部分大型企业在战争初期都转为了公有。

example.ex: He forced the country to collectivize agriculture.
example.tran: 他强迫该国对农业实行公有化。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by the principle of ownership by the state or the people of the means of production
2. subscribing to the socialistic doctrine of ownership by the people collectively
